Better call the Aeroplane Bathroom Maintenance crew, cause some shit's about to start flying.
Well, the funny thing is, viewer, that after a lengthy string of indie game sandboxes, interactive
stories and whatever the fuck that Godzilla thing was, I found myself hankering for a
bit of good old fashioned linear shooty action.
Even if I would have to spend most of it cuddling a chest-high wall with a suit of armour the
size of a boat that I'm not so much wearing as vaguely located inside, absence makes the
heart grow fonder.

than its inherent god-awfulness.
